name: Age of Steel
description:
Blood on Steel will take you into the journey through endless medieval world. 

You will meet here other nations, explore endless forests and meadows, collect iron, gold and wood to build your settlements. 

Finally you will train armies of hundreds or even thousands, which will help you to conquer this world...

Features:

- Up to 3000 - 4000 units battles 

- Diplomacy

- Realistic archery

- 11 building models with buildup and destruction animation sequences

- Resources and Economy 

- Time of the day and night building lights

- Procedural fires

- RTS and RPG cameras

- Minimap and game map

- Save and Load gameplay
